en: I'm a Frontend developer from Spain and a computer engineering student at UAH. I love to develop my creativity and take that ideas to the practice by programming. Besides being my hobby, i want to take the front-end developement to the professional ambit and take it my profession.

I consider myself a resolutive person, creative, independent and with a great learning capacity. I love to cook and travel too. Actually, I'm interested in continue learning and create better and better projects.
